Query.Sentence: WITH tabla AS( SELECT t.*,p.*,up.user_,sum(tm.tm_end_time - tm.tm_start_time) as task_total_time, sum(tm.tm_end_time - tm.tm_start_time) as task_total_time_decimal FROM tasks t INNER JOIN projects p ON t.P_ID = p.P_ID INNER JOIN users_projects up on up.p_id = t.p_id LEFT JOIN timers tm on tm.t_id = t.t_id GROUP BY t.t_id, p_name, p.p_id, up.user_ ) SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM tabla #WHERE# ORDER BY t_date asc

WITH tabla AS( SELECT p.*,t.*,up.user_ FROM tasks t INNER JOIN projects p ON t.P_ID = p.P_ID INNER JOIN users_projects up on up.p_id = t.p_id WHERE t.t_finished = false GROUP BY t.t_id, p_name, p.p_id, up.user_ ) SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM tabla #WHERE# ORDER BY p_name asc, t_name asc
